augmented_topic: Shopping and Consumer Behavior (Science Fiction Theme)
objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Science Fiction lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using neutral register
Students create original scifi themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within scifi theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with technology
shopping and consumer behavior with innovation
shopping and consumer behavior with futuristic

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
